name: Fortnite Reload
summary:
Welcome to Fortnite Reload: Desert Drop, an all-new Reload update with a new Desert map and action-packed Battle Royale gameplay featuring classic weapons, classic locations, and classic vibes for you and your squad!

Fortnite Reload Desert Drop introduces an all-new Desert map featuring iconic locations like Paradise Palms and Shifty Shafts. Solo, Duo or Squad up in Fortnite Reload, just don't lose all your reboots because that means Game Over! Whether you choose Battle Royale or Zero Build, the last player standing wins.

In team-based mode, it can pay to go for aggressive plays when there’s an automatic reboot just around the corner. If the rest of the team’s down, a lone squaddie needs to keep their head on a swivel, as staying in the game depends on their survival!

Playing solos? Keep count of your reboots and be ready for the end game.
